 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְאֵם‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Job.39.10|Job 39:10]]</sup> ==wild ox== (Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***rêmu***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 603</sup> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ראם‎</span>), Houghton<sup>TSBA v (1877). 336 ff., and illustrated before p. 33</sup> [[BDB#Schr|Schr]]<sup>KGF 135 ff.</sup>, 530 [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>NS 237 ff., 410, 436 f.</sup> [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>[[Deut.33.17|Deut 33:17]]</sup>; on strength and ferocity, [[BDB#Plin|Plin]]<sup>NH viii. 21</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְאֵמָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֵימָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֵימָנָא‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ([[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 58</sup>); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***white antelope***, antilope leucoryx; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] (erroneous) <span class="bdbLangGreek">μονοκέρως</span> ([[Isa.34.7|Isa 34:7]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἅδροι</span>, [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] ***unicornis***, and (oftener) ***rhinoceros***); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Num.23.22|Num 23:22]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְאֵים‎</span> [[Ps.92.11|Ps 92:11]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֵים‎</span> [[Job.39.9|Job 39:9]]; [[Job.39.10|Job 39:10]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְאֵמִים‎</span> [[Isa.34.7|Isa 34:7]]; [[Ps.29.6|Ps 29:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֵמִים‎</span> [[Ps.22.22|Ps 22:22]] (see [[BDB#Baer|Baer]]); — ***wild ox***, as fierce and strong [[Job.39.9|Job 39:9]]; [[Job.39.10|Job 39:10]] simile of strength of Israel, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתוֺעֲפוֺת ר‎</span> [[Num.23.22|Num 23:22]] = [[Num.24.8|Num 24:8]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתָּרֶם כִּרְאֵם קַרְנִי‎</span> [[Ps.92.11|Ps 92:11]] so figurative of Joseph, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַרְנַיו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַרְנֵי ר‎</span> [[Deut.33.17|Deut 33:17]] figurative of princes of Edom [[Isa.34.7|Isa 34:7]] ( +<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרִים עִם אַבִּירִים‎</span>); of powerful foes, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִקַּרְנֵי רֵמִים‎</span> [[Ps.22.22|Ps 22:22]] in simile of skipping, leaping, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֶּןרְֿאֵמִים‎</span> [[Ps.29.6|Ps 29:6]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵגֶּל‎</span>).
